Tests Documentation

This section documents all the test classes and methods in the News Application.

Tests Module

Unit tests for news application models, views, and API.

class news.tests.UserModelTest(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

Test cases for User model functionality and role management.

This test class validates user creation, role assignment, and role-based method functionality. It ensures the custom User model works correctly with different user roles.

Parameters:

user (User) – Test user instance for role testing

setUp()[source]

Set up test data.

test_user_creation()[source]

Test user creation with proper role assignment.

Validates that a user can be created with the correct username, email, and role attributes.

test_user_roles()[source]

Test user role method functionality.

Validates that role checking methods (is_reader, is_editor, is_journalist) work correctly for different user roles.

Test Classes

class news.tests.UserModelTest(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

Test cases for User model functionality and role management.

This test class validates user creation, role assignment, and role-based method functionality. It ensures the custom User model works correctly with different user roles.

test_user_roles()[source]
